title: Is there any secret for one to be intelligent? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ask questions all the time, great ones, bad ones seek answers passionately, ask others for help, no one can learn alone.  Read a lot, I mean it, a lot. Read about everything.Stick to brilliant people, they are infectious. When you find them, do whatever possible to stay with them. You're on Quora, that means you've made your first step towards brilliance. Congratulations.
